full_description:
COLMI P28 Plus Calling Smart Watch

The COLMI P28 Plus is a Bluetooth calling smart watch with a square shape design. It has a 1.69-inch IPS screen curved with 2.5D glass, a Heart rate monitor, a Blood oxygen monitor, 28 sport modes, and a 235mAh battery capacity. This new COLMI P28 Plus smartwatch has a square design that is athletic, attractive, and appropriate for both men and women. The dimensions of the COLMI P28 Plus Smart Watch are 43.5*36*11mm, and the weight is around 50g. On the right side of the casing, there is one physical button. It controls the operation of turning on the running back. The device's reverse side has a standard layout, including magnetic charging connectors and a heart rate sensor. The COLMI P28 Plus Smart Watch is an IP67 waterproof smartwatch that may be worn when washing your hands or on wet days. The COLMI P28 Plus features a heart rate sensor that records our heart rate for 24 hours. Because of its comprehensive sleep monitor, this model also assists you in controlling your sleep. It also features a pedometer, which allows us to track and estimate the number of calories we burn during the day. COLMI P28 Plus wristwatch includes a speaker and microphone, allowing you to make calls right from your wrist. This wearable can also track up to 28 different sports modes, such as walking, running, cycling, skipping, football, basketball, badminton, and so on. Other features include blood oxygen and blood pressure monitor, notifications, an alarm clock, weather forecast, a shutter, Bluetooth 5.0, and more. This watch features a 235mAh battery that will last 3-5 days on typical use and 7 days on standby. The COLMI P28 Plus Smart Watch has 06-months warranty.
